mapper.update: update order_detail set finished=1 where id = (select * from (select min(id) from order_detail where finished=0) as X)
mapper.select: select od.id as id, m.nickname as mname, od.quantity as quantity, menu.mname as menu from order_detail as od join order_ as o on od.order_id = o.id join member as m on m.id = o.mem_id join menu as menu on od.menu_id = menu.id order by o.id
